solution_line_template: He has to cook {total_hamburgers} hamburgers and has already cooked {already_cooked} so he needs to cook {total_hamburgers}-{already_cooked} = <<{total_hamburgers}-{already_cooked}={hamburgers_left}>>{hamburgers_left} more hamburgers

He can only cook {hamburgers_per_session} hamburgers at a time so that means he has to cook {hamburgers_left}/{hamburgers_per_session} = <<{hamburgers_left}/{hamburgers_per_session}={sessions_needed}>>{sessions_needed} more cooking sessions
